00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                            MtkParseFieldname                              =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================

00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory

00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 /* For strcasestr prototype in string.h on Linux64 */
00018 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00019 
00020 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00021 #include "MisrError.h"
00022 #ifdef __linux__
00023 #include <sys/types.h>
00024 #endif
00025 #include <regex.h>
00026 #include <string.h>
00027 #include <stdlib.h>
00028 #include <limits.h>
00029 
00035 MTKt_status MtkParseFieldname( const char *fieldname,   
00036                    char **basefieldname,    
00037                    int *ndim,       
00038                    int **dimlist            
00039 ) {
00040   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status code for error macros */
00041 #ifdef REGEXP_WORKAROUND
00042   char *endptr = NULL;      /* End pointer */
00043 #else
00044   int reg_status;       /* Regular expresssion parser status */
00045   regex_t preg;         /* Regular expression structure */
00046   regmatch_t pm;        /* Matched structure */
00047 #endif
00048   int i = 0;            /* Dim index */
00049   char c[] = { "[" };       /* Character set */
00050   size_t l;         /* Length */
00051   char buf[MAXSTR];     /* Working buffer */
00052   char *bufptr = NULL;      /* Pointer to working buffer */
00053   char *baseptr = NULL;         /* Pointer to basefieldname to return */
00054   int *dimptr = NULL;           /* Pointer to dimlist to return */
00055   char *ptr;            /* String pointer */
00056 
00057   if (fieldname == NULL || basefieldname == NULL ||
00058       ndim == NULL || dimlist == NULL)
00059     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00060 
00061   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00062   /* Allocate basefieldname and dimlist output buffers   */
00063   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00064 
00065   baseptr = (char *)calloc(MAXSTR, sizeof(char));
00066   if (baseptr == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00067 
00068   dimptr = (int *)calloc(MAXDIMS, sizeof(int));
00069   if (dimptr == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00070 
00071   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00072   /* Do a regular expression search for extra dimensions */
00073   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00074 
00075   i = 0;
00076   strcpy(buf,fieldname);
00077   bufptr = buf;
00078 
00079 #ifdef REGEXP_WORKAROUND
00080   bufptr = strchr(bufptr, '[');
00081   while (bufptr != NULL && i < MAXDIMS) {
00082     dimptr[i++] = (int)strtol(bufptr + 1, &endptr, 0);
00083     if (bufptr + 1 == endptr || *endptr != ']') {
00084       i=0;
00085       break;
00086     }
00087     bufptr = strchr(endptr, '[');
00088   }
00089 #else
00090   reg_status = regcomp(&preg, "\\[ *[0-9][0-9]* *\\]", REG_EXTENDED);
00091   if (reg_status != 0) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00092   reg_status = regexec(&preg, bufptr, 1, &pm, 0);
00093   while (reg_status == 0 && i < MAXDIMS) {
00094     dimptr[i++] = (int)strtol(bufptr + pm.rm_so + 1, NULL, 0);
00095     bufptr += pm.rm_eo;
00096     reg_status = regexec(&preg, bufptr, 1, &pm, REG_NOTBOL);
00097   }
00098   regfree(&preg);
00099 #endif
00100 
00101   *ndim = i;
00102   *dimlist = dimptr;
00103 
00104   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00105   /* Eliminate extra dimensions to isolate basefieldname */
00106   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00107 
00108   l = strcspn(fieldname, c);
00109   strncpy(baseptr, fieldname, l);
00110   baseptr[l] = '\0';
00111 
00112   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00113   /* Reduce virtual/extended fieldname to it's root name */
00114   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00115 
00116   if (strcasestr(baseptr, "raw ") != NULL)
00117     memmove(baseptr, &baseptr[4], strlen(baseptr)-4+1);
00118 
00119   else if (strcasestr(baseptr, "flag ") != NULL)
00120     memmove(baseptr, &baseptr[5], strlen(baseptr)-5+1);
00121 
00122   else if ((ptr = strcasestr(baseptr, " Radiance")) != NULL)
00123     strcpy(ptr, " Radiance/RDQI");
00124 
00125   else if ((ptr = strcasestr(baseptr, " RDQI")) != NULL)
00126     strcpy(ptr, " Radiance/RDQI");
00127 
00128   else if ((ptr = strcasestr(baseptr, " DN")) != NULL)
00129     strcpy(ptr, " Radiance/RDQI");
00130 
00131   else if ((ptr = strcasestr(baseptr, " Equivalent Reflectance")) != NULL)
00132     strcpy(ptr, " Radiance/RDQI");
00133 
00134   else if ((ptr = strcasestr(baseptr, " Brf")) != NULL)
00135     strcpy(ptr, " Radiance/RDQI");
00136 
00137   *basefieldname = baseptr;
00138 
00139   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00140  ERROR_HANDLE:
00141   if (baseptr != NULL) free(baseptr);
00142   if (dimptr != NULL) free(dimptr);
00143   return status_code;
00144 }
